Introduction

19 Jun 2015

Welcome to cosmo blog, am not really a blog type of person but i just decided to start writing about what people like me really need to overcome there greatest distraction
NOTE: THIS WEBSITE WAS CODED ON A FRAMEWORK CALLLED JEKYLL A RUBY BASED PLATFORM.

I decided to pick jekyll because am not a lazy programmer and i love doing things the hard way of cause there are easier way to write blogs i mean very easy ways, but we as programmers are meant to do things our own way and leave the other ways of blogging to those who can’t code. rr
